name: Observers
description:
*CAUTION: Flashing lights in game may induce seizure*

Story
When the treasury of the United Friends Organization explodes and all of their cosmic diamonds scatter across the galaxy, it is up to the Observers to recollect them all!

Gameplay
Play with your friends as one of the four Observers, Blili, Glord, Wiezni, or Sragpoo, each with their own unique ability to master. Combine your abilities and find unique solutions to reach the diamond in each level.

Includes
- 4 Players controls for a single keyboard
- Controller support

Does NOT Include:
- Online Multiplayer
- Settings Menu

Other
- Roughly 1 hour of gameplay. Depending on how good you are.
